doc:
Cyril Chamberlain https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cyril_Chamberlain 0 Cyril Chamberlain (8 March 1909 – 5 December 1974) was an English film and television actor. He appeared in a number of the early Carry On, Doctor and St. Trinian's films.He was born on 8 March 1909 in London and died in Builth Wells in Wales on 5 December 1974 aged 65. He spent his final five years in retirement restoring antique furniture.He was married to actress Lisa Lee and they had one child.He appeared in 139 films between 1938 and 1966. His first film appearance was in the 1939 Will Hay comedy film Ask a Policeman; his role was uncredited. Cyril_Chamberlain ( 8_March_1909 – 5_December_1974 ) was an_English_film_and_television_actor . He appeared in a_number of the_early_Carry_On , Doctor and St._Trinian 's_films.He was_born on 8_March_1909 in London and died in Builth_Wells in Wales on 5_December_1974_aged_65 . He spent his_final_five_years in retirement restoring antique_furniture.He was_married to actress_Lisa_Lee and they had one_child.He appeared in 139_films between 1938_and_1966 . His_first_film_appearance was in the_1939_Will_Hay_comedy_film Ask a_Policeman ; his_role was uncredited .
